text: Milan Šimčák (born 23 August 1995) is a Slovak footballer who plays for FK Senica as a defender. ==Club career== Šimčák was born in Košice in Slovakia. Šimčák won the 2014–15 DOXXbet liga with the Zemplín Michalovce. He made his professional Fortuna Liga debut for Zemplín against AS Trenčín on 18 July 2015.MFK Zemplín Michalovce – AS Trenčín 18.07.2015, onlajny.eu ==References== ==External links== *MFK Zemplín Michalovce official profile *Futbalnet profile * Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Košice Category:Slovak footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:MFK Zemplín Michalovce players Category:FC Lokomotíva Košice players Category:FC DAC 1904 Dunajská Streda players Category:Slovak Super Liga players Category:2. title: Milan Šimčák
